I listened to the message later and they called me "Karina"  
Excuse me?

How does "iana"  sound like "Karina"  Better yet, how does it look like "iana" because I wrote my name down on their silly fill out form.

They may be a good spa, or they may be as bad as they are rude. I will never know because I will never go back there. 

I say stay away

218.review:
Came here because I bought a Groupon for a facial, but decided to add on a massage as well.  The facial was nothing to write home about, but the massage was AWESOME!!  Karen was so amazing and really targeted all the awful knots in my back.  I made a second appointment right away because I was so impressed with her; however, was disappointed when I ended up with a different therapist who didn't compare. Oh well, now I know to specify.

The place is cute inside, but the walls are pretty thin so if there are people out in the lobby or in the shops next door, you'll hear the entire conversation loud and clear. (Kind of annoying when you're trying to relax.)  Other than that, the place is great and I would definitely recommend it.  The prices (and Karen) worth the drive down to Morgan Hill!

219.review:
I used Respclearance for our Osha respiratory compliance testing and training.  The team they sent out was extremely knowledgeable and professional.  They got through the fit testing of 109 employees without a hicup.  The training was very interactive and not boring like most.  I would strong recommend Respclearance for these services.  We loved working with Scott, Brian and Kim.  Really courteous and great follow up on all the questions my team had.

Safety Officer

220.review: I used Dawson Compliance due to a employee compliant to OSHA regarding the respiratory protection standard.  They explained all the requirements, had a extremely quick turnaround, the online system was easy, and most importantly OSHA was pleased with the documentation.

221.review: If you are looking for someone to help you relieve some stress, Karen is the right choice. She is very thorough with her treatments and the atmosphere is superb. She puts on some relaxing music and makes you feel so relaxed. She offers a variety of treatments including spectacular massages and facials, and she is great at what she does. you can tell that she really enjoys her profession.  I wouldn't go to anyone else. I'm so glad I found her!

222.review:
Karen is simply AMAZING! Period! Also, for the 1 yelper who gave this place a bad review, come on now, let's not get carried away, you might have had a bad experience here for whatever reason, but what's with the drama?! Business owners work so hard to run a business and their is so many variables they have to deal with, so cut them some slack, already.

Karen is the best masseus I have EVER had and I have gottem massages from all over the world, enough said. :)

223.review: I just had my 6th microdermabrasion here. Karen is wonderful. I highly recommend this place.

224.review: These people are hard to get a hold of. I called and left a couple of messages, finally received a call back and got in. She did well with the facial but the hand treatment massage was just ok.  I am not a fan of playing phone tags or not knowing if I'll get a return call so ill try someone else. It's just not good business practice.

225.review: Great relaxing space.  Too bad I was here for an underarm wax, but even that was pleasant.  She doesn't use the cheap stuff and makes sure you get the right stuff.  I will definitely stop by if I'm in the area again for a facial or massage.

226.review:
I agree with yelpers about the booklet for $40 special! I called and left a message and no one called back for a week. I called again and they do not have enough technicians working to accommodate the times you need. The booklet expires December end and they are willing to extend but only if the buyer pays additional money and upgrade! 

In the past I have had technicians cancelling at the last moment. Not worth it..there are many more professionals in the area. My loss of $40, but a lesson learnt.

227.review:
What a wonderful experience it is to work with Rebecca!  She came to our home to take pictures of our family with our newborn.  She seemed comfortable and she was so patient with us and our babe that it truly made our photo shoot enjoyable.  It was as if she was celebrating our daughter's birth with us.  

Rebecca's turn around time after the photo shoot was timely.  She captured so many of the expressions that we have grown to know and love in our child.  These pictures will be cherished for years to come!  

As an extra perk, we got her recent Living Social deal which made the pictures quite affordable for us.

228.review: I am an ER nurse and I routinely get a massage from Karen to get all the kinks out. She is absolutely amazing and I highly recommend.

229.review:
EEEEK GADS..............This place was terrible. I wish I had paid more attention to LanaC's review before I bought the Groupon for a couple's massage for this place. It's pretty rare to see a Groupon for a massage place in Morgan Hill, so I thought I'd jump at the opportunity. 

I agree, the customer service was terrible. I first tried to make a weekend appt but was told they were too busy and a weekday was better. .........So I made a weekday appt. I took the day off as I thought it would be a nice spa day.    When we arrived, the owner advised she wouldn't be able to take care of us that day because her therapist had car trouble. She said she had tried to call but couldn't reach me. I'm not sure how that happened, because I wasn't  asked for my phone number when I arrived. I was finally able to rescehdule the appt for a weekend. Again, when we went in, we were told that someone had tried to call us..........this time, to confirm the appt. 

I'm not sure what kind of business is next door, maybe a karate studio or something like tht. All I can say is, the walls are thin and you can hear lots of noise. Not a very peaceful environment. The massage was terrible - I was in pain - when I commented that the massage was painful, she didn't even lighten up. Also there was no flow. And Forget the feet, those weren't even touched!!!!  

The facialist talked me into getting my eyebrows waxed - she let out a giant "oops" when part of my skin on my eyelid was ripped off.  I took pictures of my eyelid and I hope there is no scarring.............

I'm not really sure how this place got so many great reviews...............

230.review:
Facial @ Sabai with Leny Wongsopawiro.

What a delightful facial I had today!   Ms. Leny is so professional and kind as she explains every step of the process.  She was very adept at telling me what she was doing and why, as well as the type of products she used.  Her demeanor is so pleasant and I even fell asleep at points because I was so relaxed!  She is very sure of herself and the way in which she massaged my neck and face felt luxurious. 

Afterwards, my face felt magnificent!  So smooth and soft.  I will be going back to Ms. Leny very soon.  Highly recommended!

231.review:
Melted. Butter. Best massage of my life! But I'll get to that.

My appointment today was for 1pm, and I got there right as Veronika, my massage therapist, was arriving. So we were the only ones there! It's a beautiful spa, very peaceful. I filled out the new patient form while she was getting everything ready. I indicated what parts of my body needed to be focused on, and then when we were in the room we discussed it together. She was very thorough in her questioning regarding the tension I was feeling and my pressure preference. 

I told her I liked medium pressure, not so intense that it hurts and not so light that I'm being tickled. Let's face it, I can get tickled at home by my boyfriend for free. She really listened to me and throughout the entire massage I felt like I was getting exactly the right amount of pressure and she was focusing on all the right spots. Not to mention the massage oil she used smelled sooo lovely! The one-hour signature massage I got came with a foot exfoliation, which was very nice.

After the (amazing) massage she told me things she noticed about my body that I didn't even know! It's so cool that she cares enough about what she does to pay that much attention and give that level of service. (It was also nice that she didn't talk too much during the massage, but she did ask occasionally how I was feeling and if the pressure was okay. Much appreciated!)

I will definitely be a regular client of Veronika's, and hopefully I'll try some of the other services they offer at Sabai, like the facials. I'm not kidding when I say this was the best massage of my life! I'm used to going to day spas that are pretty, but don't have much to show for it in terms of results. Sabai is better than that, they are specialists and they will help you feel so much better.

The spa is super easy to find, in the Candy Park Business Center on Monterey St. (Suite E). I can't wait to go back! :D

232.review: Melody was my day of coordinator for my wedding on June 20th 2014. I don't have the words to express how grateful I am to her for everything that she did!!! Melody is absolutely AMAZING in everything that she does. Had it not been for her, my wedding would have been a disaster! But instead, I had the most amazing day with no hiccups; she took care of it ALL. Melody met with my husband and I weeks before our wedding to get all of the details, confirmed payment/delivery/pickup with all of my vendors weeks in advance, was at our venue on the day of bright and early making sure everyone was on time and that all things were in order, tied any loose ends on the day of that would have driven me crazy, was dressed super cute and professional for the event and even jumped in to help serve and pick up after my guests during dinner. I literally had to do NOTHING on my wedding day other than enjoy my day! I really don't know what I would have done without her. Highly highly HIGHLY recommend Melody for any event!

233.review: For a wonderfull facial book an appointment with Leny-  My skin feels clean and fresh.  She is great at what she does, she takes her time and makes sure that your skin is pampered.  I would highly recommend her!

234.review:
I uploaded before and after pic which my current OMBRE color wasn't just for me... I've always had all over hilite and thought to try a shortcut with inexpensive hair color style w/ombre. Well I have 6 kids but I can't get away frm hilite now I know.
I really like hilite and enjoy it so I am determined to come back to see JACKIE for touch-up my hilite no matter what my kids & hubby think hehe Cuz I really like my result which it was done by JACKIE
Oh! This salon is extremely clean and I was very relaxed, enjoyed a time away from home. JACKIE is a very sweet lady who definitely knows how to make u comfortable and treat u the way u wanna be treated
Thnk u JACKIE~

235.review: Came here with a Groupon for an hour massage and mini facial and, boy, was it worth it.  Best massage of my life! It's true what they say about Karen, she is the best.  You can really tell that she puts care into her practice; and she has really strong hands too.  She found a knot in my back and really worked on it.  Her service was punctual and friendly. I've had other massages at four other places in Morgan Hill and Sabai is the best.  I will definitely be returning.

236.review:
I went for my first of 3 Microderms using a Groupon I bought a few months back. It was a great deal 3 treatments for $99.  I usually don't buy Groupons for services for fear of not receiving better service because of being a Groupon client. I was also afraid of not being able to book an appointment because of large number of clients who bought the Groupon. I was also hoping it was not a hole in the wall either. 

I was grateful that I was wrong about all my preconceived notions! Sabai is absolutely gorgeous as well as relaxing. From the decor to the scented candles,  its definitely top notch.  Very clean too!

The Aesthetician, Grace, was absolutely amazing and very warm and friendly.  Also very experienced in her techniques and recommendations.  The Diamond tipped micro head she uses did a great job getting rid of my dead skin revealing fresh new skin underneath.  After the micro,  she put on a mask to both brighten and moisturize my skin. While mask was on, she did neck and shoulder massage which was amazing.  I walked out with radiant , soft, glowing skin.  

Microderm is a great compliment to my sublative treatment I get with Dr. Le in San Jose.  Sublative works to build collagen from the inside skin layers out while Microderm reveals fresh skin from outer layers of my skin. Works great together. I am excited to get my third treatment in 3 weeks. Thank you, Grace!

237.review: My daughter bought me a Groupon for a massage and mini facial.  I arrived 10 minutes early.  The receptionist arrived 10 minutes late.  the massage therapist was there pacing waiting for the place to open when I got there but I didn't know it was the massage therapist until I was introduced before my massage.  She was one of the best that I have had and I have had a lot of massages.  I think her name is Karen but I'm not positive.  My mini facial was very good too.  I was impressed.  I walked out feeling great!

238.review: I've had tons of massages all over the world -- and I got  one of the best yesterday at Sabai! Wow! Karen was fantastic! There was no locker room and all that nonsense, but I got ready in the massage room which was nice and toasty. She used warm oils and asked if the pressure was OK. It was a fantastic experience and a real value. I will definitely be back!

239.review:
For massages Karen is a pro at using a variety of techniques to help relax those troubling knots. Recently I also did a facial with her - my skin looks great - was also my first time to try a microdermabrasion. 

She offers great spa treatments at a reasonable price.

240.review:
Karen is the best I am a hairstylist and my back and shoulders are very much in need of a massage when I leave Karen gets out all my knots and I am good to go ready to work again 
Also she does my facials I leave and my skin glows 
Thanks Sabai  I will go no where else

241.review: Rebecca took the most beautiful photos at my daughter's bat mitzvah. It was hard to narrow them down for an album because the photos were all wonderful! I've been using Rebecca for years as my family's photographer. She is easy to work with and always has great suggestions. My kids (3 of them) don't always cooperate yet Rebecca is still able to shoot beautiful shots. I can't say enough great things about the quality of her work!! She is a true artist behind the lens!! I can't wait for our next photo shoot!!

242.review:
Rebecca recently shot a book cover and author photo for me, and did an amazing job. She was patient, kind, funny, and made me feel totally comfortable. And she worked until we knew that we had many top-notch options to choose from. After just a couple hours, I had professional images I could use for the next few years. 

I highly recommend Rebecca Vinacour Photography. She delivered what she promised.

243.review: Rebecca shot our wedding at the Royal Palms and we found her photography to be amazing. Rebecca used the gardens as perfect backdrops for lovely settings and used the natural lighting of the evening sun excellently.  She captured photos of the two of us in candid shots as well as a good variety of posed shots.  We also received great photos of family and friends creating such great memories. I highly recommend Rebecca Vinacour Photography!

244.review: I bought a newly build home 3 months ago.  It has a Chamberlin Liftmaster Formula 1 garage door opener with a sticker of Seacoast Garage Doors, 916 448-3374.  I called this company as the belt drive has become loose, approximately 3 inches of play.  I requested an adjustment and they wanted to charge me a $25.00 service fee.  They clearly DO NOT stand behind their installation once it has been installed without more money for a service call.  NOT GOOD PRACTICE.

245.review: Don't ever go through this establishment. I called on Sunday and they scheduled me an appointment between 9-12pm on Labor Day. I thought "wow, what great service". Well, I was wrong. It was 11:50am and still no technician, so I call. They then tell me that their technician was running late and it would now be between 2-5pm!! I had already postponed all of my errands for today since it's my day off. I was upset because if I wouldn't have called I would have been here till 5pm waiting! The guy on the phone was not even apologetic, so I got upset and instead of offering me another technician or someone will come to my home as soon as possible, it was more of the attitude of "you should be glad someone is coming out to your home". When they offered someone can come by tomorrow, I said cancel my appointment and that I will never do business with this company again. Then he hung up on me when I asked for the true name of their business! I just went by the sticker on the garage opener that came with this home we  bought. This mishap was a blessing in disguise now that I'm seeing all the other reviews, which are not good!!! STAY AWAY FROM THESE GUYS!!

246.review:
This company's sticker was on our garage door. We called them to set up a repair and they couldnt give us a quote over the phone which we felt was weird. They said they would be there in a 4 hour window but we decided to cancel After reading reviews. About 30 minutes later someone called and we told them we had cancelled. And then even after that the person still showed up at our house. Tbat didnt sit well with me. 

After reading reviews we decided to use another company and was told this company goes into open houses and places their sticker on garage doors.i felt they still showed up to try and get business even though we didnt feel comfortable with their services.

247.review:
Stopped in over a week before Halloween since an ordered costume was going to not be in for my daughter's school's party, despite being ordered early enough. The store was chaotic and messy. Employees were standing around talking to one another and not helping customers, which there were plenty of parents and children looking for costumes. I asked a young female embloyee next to me for a specific costume, interrupting her conversation with another employee.  She looked at me, hesitated as if it were a bother, but finally called back for my costume.  Without further instruction, she turned and walked away, speaking to another female employee. I asked another parent, who told me to walk around back. I found a table near a set of double doors in the back of the store. It was strewn with bagged costumes and no one there to instruct or ensure the costumes were correct. I found the costume I asked for, in the size I requested, and checked out. It was the most pleasant employee interaction of the excursion. I got home, only to find that part of the costume was missing (wand). After my experience there, I wouldn't recommend it, nor did I return and deal with the hassle.  

For reference, wand was to come with costume: http://www.partycity.com/product/girls+ballerina+bee+costume.do?navSet=280529

248.review: Employee Refused Order for fallen police officer officer. They have to fire that employee, or the store needs to be boycotted

249.review: It was crazy but we decided to drop in here a few days before Halloween. It was pretty crazy busy, but we were able to find exactly what we needed and at good prices. The line was long but the employees were all nice and doing their best to keep the line moving. I was shocked how quickly we were able to get in and out right before such a busy holiday.

250.review: Came in to buy a birthday balloon. Was told they weren't taking walk in balloon orders because they have a helium shortage. Will never be back here.
